title: *Cue Final Fantasy Victory Jingle* 1000th Normal Win!
body: Thank you so much for the game, Riot Katey Khaos! :D

replies.body:
I salute you for playing poppy.
Congrats on the win!

W E D I D I T B O Y S.

IT TOTALLY COUNTS AS 1K, WE JUST DID TEAM BUILDER. :D
I might be late, I am around 1060 wins now but I didn't know about the 999 thing :( I guess I missed my chance
Damn you Barennoso.  Now I can't get that FF7 victory jingle out of my head!!!

Didn't check the forums for like three weeks and come back to find this comment...







Excellent.
